page.title: 13HOMES IN ROWSLEY
page.content: HOMES IN ROWSLEY THE NORMAL HOME IN OUR BLOCK IS QUITE SMALL,AND MOSTLY MADE OF DERBYSHIRE GRITSTONE.THERE ARE NOT MANY FLATS IN OUR BLOCK AND CERTAINLY NOT ANY HIGH RISE FLATS. WE HAVE GOT SLATES ON THE ROOFS AROUND HERE AND THEY ARE MAINLY RED.MOST HOUSES IN OUR AREA HAVE SOME DOMESTIC ANIMALS MAINLY CATS AND DOGS. THE HOUSES IN OUR AREA ARE MAINLY SMALL COTTAGES WITH JUST A FEW BIG HOUSES.WE LIVE IN THE COUNTRYSIDE IN ROWSLEY AND BEELEY,SO WE HAVE A LOT OF FARMS,WOODS AND FIELDS .WE ALSO HAVE SOME MOOR - LAND IN OUR AREA. WE HAVE TWO RIVERS RUNNING THROUGH OUR AREA CALLED THE RIVER DERWENT AND THE RIVER WYE.WE HAVE THE LOCAL ROWSLEY FESTIVAL EVERY YEARIN THE SUMMER :WE HAVE MORRIS DANCERS DANCING FOR US.
